description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the laser printers and MFPs (multifunction printers) which implement Ricoh Web Image Monitor. If exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who accessed Web Image Monitor. As for the details of affected product names and versions, refer to the information provided by the vendors under [References].
